H0.text: The water of oceans is where the fossils of dinosaurs that lived millions of years ago can be found.

H1.text: The ice on ponds is where the fossils of dinosaurs that lived millions of years ago can be found.

H2.text: The fossils of dinosaurs that lived millions of years ago can be found in the trunks of trees.

H3.text: Rocks in the ground are where fossils of dinosaurs that lived millions of years ago can be found.

A4.text: The development of radiometric dating techniques in the early 20th century allowed scientists to quantitatively measure the absolute ages of rocks and the fossils they host.

A5.text: The observation in the 19th century that certain fossils were associated with certain rock strata led to the recognition of a geological timescale
